item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is my blog site. Here I send what interested me as my own notes, links that may also be interesting to someone. The site uses hugo SSG and the HB (Hugo Bootstrap) Framework template From the name of the site “manpage” it is clear that there will be some instructions or practical recommendations. It is clear that everything moves and changes and I will correct possible inaccuracies. Blogging plans
